name: Two Column Admin
author: Chris Jenkins

sections.description: Provides the ability to select from the classic 1 or 2 column setup on your dashboard in wp-admin. There are no settings, simply install, activate, and then use “Screen Settings” in the main dashboard view to select one or two columns.
sections.installation:
1. Upload all files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. That’s it! There are no settings.
sections.faq:
Can I touch your hair?

Only if you buy me a beer first.

What about foo bar?

Answer to foo bar dilemma.

upgrade_notice.1.0: If you haven't upgraded to 1.0, you probably never actually installed the plugin. Just sayin'.
